related_information: Documentation Panda3D developers considered that doesn’t fit in any of the packages (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)

This defines the various kinds of AnimChannels that may be defined as well as the MovingPart class which binds to the channels and plays the animation (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)

Defines and manages the data graph; which is the hierarchy of devices; tforms; and any other things which might have an input or an output and need to execute every frame (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)
Abstract display classes including pipes; windows; channels; and display regions (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)
Tool to allow automatic download of files in the background (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)
Handles all communication with the DirectX backend; and manages state to minimize redundant state changes (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)

A.k.a. the “egg loader”; this converts the egg structure read from the egg library; above; to a scene graph structure; suitable for rendering (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)
Tools for throwing; handling and receiving events (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)
Handy for quickly writing programs that can open a window and display the OmniTriangle (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)
Graphical non-scene-graph objects such as textures and geometry primitives (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)
All code specific to rendering on a particular platform is contained within a well-defined class called a graphics state guardian (doi:10.1109/mc.2004.180)
Reads and writes image files in various formats by using the pnm and tiff libraries (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)

Data transforming objects that live in the data graph and convert raw data (as read from an input device for instance) to something more useful. (https://readthedocs.org/projects/panda-developer-manual/downloads/pdf/latest/)
This function is called by native_app_glue to initialize the program.
ProgramBase base class as a base class for simple programs
